Title: Oyo govt approves ₦45m for control of HIV/AIDS
Summary: Governor Seyi Makinde has approved a sum of ₦45 million for the Oyo State Agency for the Control of AIDS (OYSACA) OYSACA is to further curb the spread of HIV/AIDS across the state .

Title: Chinese envoy hails Ogun as hub of Chinese investments in Nigeria
Summary: Chinese Ambassador to Nigeria, Mr. Yu Dunhai, has described Ogun State as the leading host of Chinese enterprises in the country . Ambassador Yu made the remark on the state's government for creating a favorable environment for trade and industry .

Title: 2027 poll: Activist IG Wala unveils ‘Handshake Movement’, joins ADC
Summary: Ibrahim Garba Wala has declared for the African Democratic Congress (ADC) Wala unveiled a new political platform, The Handshake Movement (THM), in Abuja on Thursday . Wala, who has long been a human rights and anti-corruption advocate, is widely known as IG Wala .

Title: Nigeria ranks 7th globally in cervical cancer cases
Summary: Nigeria has the highest number of cervical cancer incidents in sub-Saharan Africa with about 12,000 cases every year, and about 8,000 deaths . Globally, Nigeria ranks number seven amongst the countries that have the highest incidents of cervical .

Title: Adeleke, Osun APC bicker over NBA’s role in council funds
Summary: Governor Ademola Adeleke and the state chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) disagree over the role played by the Nigerian Bar Association (NBA) in the withheld monthly allocation of local government councils in Osun .

Title: ASUU threatens fresh strike over unmet demands
Summary: The union expressed frustration over the Federal Government’s handling of the renegotiated draft agreement submitted in February 2025 by the Alhaji Yayale Ahmed-led committee .

Title: We shall defeat Pharaohs against us – Adeleke assures PDP members
Summary: Osun State Governor, Ademola Adeleke, has disclosed that his administration and the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, in the state would defeat the pharaoh facing the state and get its dues back . The Governor had gone on vacation to the USA during which he attended his nephew’s (Davido) wedding in

Title: Adeleke meets US political leaders, business moguls, declares Osun readiness for partnership
Summary: Osun State Governor, Ademola Adeleke has expressed the state’s readiness for partnership . He met with Georgia's top political leaders, mayors, and business leaders in Atlanta, United States of America . The move is part of his administration's efforts to build cross-border relations .

Title: Benue bans basic school graduation parties, non-transferable textbooks
Summary: Benue Government bans kindergarten, nursery and basic school pupils' graduation parties . The state government also placed an immediate ban on non-transferable textbooks in Benue schools .

Title: Withheld Council Funds: FG punishing Osun residents, not politicians – Youths coalition lament
Summary: A coalition of Youth Associations in Osun State has disclosed that the withheld local government council fund is a direct punishment of the residents of the state instead of politicians . Speaking with newsmen in Osogbo on Thursday the impact of the seized funds, the coalition spokesperson, Babawale Jamiu said governance at the local government level
